p: Aghili has described a Mizaj for 1421 of the 1741 main drug monographs, including 384 views from other scholars. Considering the 2696 tuples of UNaProd, a total of 1976 tuples contain information regarding Mizaj. There are ten main Mizaj types in ITM, the frequency which was demonstrated in Figure 2(e). The most common Mizaj type for medicinal substances of Makhzan al-Advieh was the hot-dry Mizaj constituting 55.7% of the drug monographs with a determined Mizaj, followed by cold-dry (16.5%), hot-wet (8.1%), cold-wet (5.4%), balanced (4.8%), hot (3.6%), and Morakkab al-Ghovaa Mizaj ascribed to drugs that can exhibit more than two qualities (2.3%), dry (1.7%), cold (1.6%), and finally wet (0.4%) Mizaj types.
